title: Auxiliary-Data-Risk.Evaluate.Input
description: Input messageType for the Auxiliary-Data-Risk.Evaluate capability.

dataset.description: Primary dataset being evaluated for auxiliary-data re-identification risk.

auxiliary_sources.description: List of auxiliary datasets or sources that could be used for linkage.

schema.description: Fields available in the auxiliary dataset.

sample_records.description: Optional sample records for structural comparison.

quasi_identifiers.description: Attributes that may be linkable across datasets.

context.description: Optional context from the requesting agent.
